question: Which of the following was the first Sikh Guru and founder of the Sikhism?
explanation: Guru Nanak was the first Sikh Guru. He was the founder of the Sikhism, who was also a Nirguna Bhakti Saint and a social reformer.Â  He was born in a Khatri household in the village of Talwandi which is now called Nankana.
